actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/advancedsearchinsidebar/currentTab' text=<>/>"/> \end \define cancel-search-actions() \whitespace trim <$list text="yes"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=".tc-advanced-search input"/> \end \define input-accept-actions() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="<$list filter='[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]'><$action-navigate $to={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>"> <$action-navigate $to={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/> \end \define input-accept-variant-actions() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="<$list filter='[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]'><$list filter='[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]'><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-edit-tiddler' $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>"> <$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/> \end \define toggleButton() \whitespace trim <$reveal state=<> default="table" type="match" text="table"> text="table"> <$button tooltip="Switching to card view" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="table"/> {{$:/xp/images/switch}} \end

"},"$:/plugins-currently-installed/RewrittenTiddlers":{"title":"$:/plugins-currently-installed/RewrittenTiddlers","text":"\define deleteOTButton() \whitespace trim <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right" tooltip="Delete these rewritten tiddlers"> <$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete these rewritten tiddlers?"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]]"/> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} \end <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]!has[draft.of]is[system]has[plugin-type]each[plugin-type]sort[plugin-type]]">
<$reveal default={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]!has[draft.of]is[system]plugin-type{!!plugin-type}search:title,plugin-typeplugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]count[]] }}} type="nomatch" text="0"> <$text text={{{ [{!!plugin-type}sentencecase[]addsuffix[s]] }}}/>
    <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]!has[draft.of]is[system]plugin-type{!!plugin-type}sort[]search:title,plugin-type]" variable="listPlugin"> <$reveal default={{{ [plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]count[]] }}} type="nomatch" text="0">

  1. <$link to=<>><$view tiddler=<> field="title"/> <>

      <$list filter="[plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]sort[]]">
    • <$link><$view field="title"/>
"},"$:/plugins-currently-installed":{"title":"$:/plugins-currently-installed","caption":"已装插件","text":"\import $:/plugins-macros \whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/ \define storeTitle() $:/temp/search/plugins-currently-installed \define rewriteTid() $:/config/xp/aggregation-plugins/installed-plugins/Rewrite \define search-tips() <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="rewritten" default="table"> Search all fields except text <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="rewritten"> Search title \end \define cancel-search-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=".xp-search-installed-plugins input"/> \end \define controlButtons() \whitespace trim <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="list"> <> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="rewritten"> <$vars rewriteState=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text=""> <$button set=<> setTo=yes tooltip="Help" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/help}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button set=<> setTo="" tooltip="Help" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/help}} \end \define helpinfo() <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="" class="tc-tiddler-info tc-popup-handle" animate="yes" retain="yes">
<$button set=<> setTo="" tooltip="Close" aria-label="close panel" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
此处查看被改写的插件条目，通过搜索插件可以对结果进行过滤。 改写有两种情况： # 用户条目改写默认条目。 # 默认条目改写默认条目。即根据插件的优先级，一个插件改写了另一个插件中的条目。 ''第一种情况：''通过删除按钮（经过确认后）可以删除用户条目，还原为默认条目。 ''第二种情况：''这里只能查看哪些插件改写了 $:/core 中的条目。操作方法为： * 第一步：<>。将 $:/core 中的插件条目保存到 $:/core/plugintiddlers。弹出提示「已完成」后，进行下一步。 * 第二步：<>。如果其他插件含有「核心条目」则[[显示|$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers]]。 > ''变动插件或者升级 TW 后，需重新执行以上相应步骤，以确保数据正确。'' > 对于插件开发者或者自定义玩家这非常有用，因为每次 TW 更新，你都需要检查一下，重写了 $:/core 中的条目是否新增了代码（新增了功能）。
我习惯给修改的核心条目（或者参照核心条目新建的条目）添加一个 `rewrite` 字段，比如 `rewrite: 5.2.3`，表示改写自 5.2.3 中的版本。 \end \define saveButton() <$button> 保存核心条目 <$list filter="[[$:/core]plugintiddlers[]]" variable="coreTiddler"> <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/core/plugintiddlers" $subfilter="+[append]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/language/Notifications/Complete"/> \end \define runButton() <$button> 生成数据 <$list filter="[plugin-type[plugin]] -$:/core" variable="myPlugin"> <$vars storeTitle={{{ [[$:/config/rewritecoretiddlers/]addsuffix] }}}> <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> list /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> tags="$:/tags/Rewrite" name=<>/> <$list filter="[plugintiddlers[]format:titlelist[]]" variable="listItem"> <$list filter="[[$:/core/plugintiddlers]contains]" variable="ignore"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[append]"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers" text=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[tag[$:/tags/Rewrite]] :filter[get[name]!has[title]]"/> \end \define showRewriteData()
Rewrite core tiddlers
    <$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/Rewrite]has[list]sort[]search:list,name]" variable="listItem">

  1. <$link to={{{ [get[name]] }}}/>

      <$list filter="[listsort[]]" variable="rewrite">
    • <$link to=<>/>
\end <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio value="table"> 默认视图   <$radio value="list"> 列表视图   <$radio value="rewritten"> 改写条目
<> <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}} inputCancelActions=<>/> <>
<$vars userInput={{{ [get[text]] }}} rewriteState=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="table" default="table" animate="yes"> {{$:/plugins-currently-installed/DefaultView}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="list" animate="yes"> {{$:/plugins-currently-installed/ListView}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="rewritten" animate="yes"> <> <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio value="user"> 用户条目   <$radio value="shadow"> 默认条目 <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="user"> {{$:/plugins-currently-installed/RewrittenTiddlers}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="shadow"> <$list filter="[[$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers]is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore"> {{$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers}} <$list filter="[[$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers]!is[tiddler]]"> 请点击 help 按钮，参照第二种情况生成数据。 "},"$:/plugins-help":{"title":"$:/plugins-help","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/core/images/help","text":"
''PLUGINS 的用途：''收集和管理自己的 TiddlyWiki 插件。
! 如何使用？ !!! 点击 {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new plugincard 创建一个插件的信息卡片。 常用字段： |!Field |!Description | |`caption` |显示名称，通常是对 `title` 的简化。 | |^`moscow` |根据 [[MoSCoW Method|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MoSCoW_method]] 对软件进行需求评级。
''M'' -- //Must have//，''S'' -- //Should have//，''C'' -- //Could have//，''W'' -- //Won’t have//。 | |`url` |插件的获取地址。 | |^`linkcolor` |//(optional)// 用于修改条目的链接颜色。你可以选择一个颜色，或者手动输入 `red` 或者 `<>`。 | !!! 在已装插件 -> 改写条目，你可以查看哪些默认条目被改写了。 "},"$:/plugins-macros":{"title":"$:/plugins-macros","tags":"$:/tags/Macro/Aggregation","text":"\define aggregationTag() Plugin Card \define systemCTag() $:/tags/MyWorks \define config-base() $:/config/xp/aggregation-plugins/Tabs/Visibility/ \define statusTid() $:/config/xp/aggregation-plugins/installed-plugins/View \define versionTid() $:/config/xp/aggregation-plugins/installed-plugins/ShowVersion \define versionButton() \whitespace trim <$reveal state=<> default="show" type="match" text="show"> <$button tooltip="Hide version" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="hide"/> {{$:/core/images/preview-open}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="show"> <$button tooltip="Show version" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="show"/> {{$:/core/images/preview-closed}} \end 
<$view field="text"/>
"},"$:/plugins-my-collections/editions":{"title":"$:/plugins-my-collections/editions","caption":"发行版","text":"! 官方版本 https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Editions.html ! 社区版本 https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Community%2520Editions.html "},"$:/plugins-my-collections/must-have":{"title":"$:/plugins-my-collections/must-have","caption":"Must Have","text":"罗列所有必装插件的链接。用于检查是否已经安装。 @@.twocolumns !! Online Plugin Library !! Plugins !! Themes and Palettes !! @@"},"$:/plugins-my-collections/notes":{"title":"$:/plugins-my-collections/notes","text":""},"$:/plugins-my-collections/plugin-info":{"title":"$:/plugins-my-collections/plugin-info","caption":"插件信息","text":"\import text="popup"/> popup · get[text]match[table]] +[then[xp-active-indicator-muted]] }}}> <$button tooltip="Table view" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="table"/> table · get[text]match[card]] +[then[xp-active-indicator-muted]] }}}> <$button tooltip="Card view" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="card"/> card get[text]match[recent]] +[then[xp-active-indicator-muted]] }}}> <$button tooltip="Recently added" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="recent"/> recent \end \define mRun() +[moscow[M]] \define sRun() +[moscow[S]] \define cRun() +[moscow[C]] \define wRun() +[moscow[W]] \define oRun() +[!has[moscow]] <$list filter="[tag!has[draft.of]limit[1]]" emptyMessage="{{$:/plugins-prompt}}" variable="ignore"> Search <> <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/xp/aggregation/SearchAutoFocus}} "},"$:/plugins-my-works/newtab":{"title":"$:/plugins-my-works/newtab","caption":"{{$:/core/images/new-button}}","tags":"$:/tags/MyWorks","text":"\define titleStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Title \define captionStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Caption \define textStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Text \define storeTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Title/input \define newButton() {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-myworkstab}} \define deleteButton() \whitespace trim <$vars newtabTitle={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title}}> <$list filter="[get[text]match]" variable="ignore"> <$button tooltip="Delete existing tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete this tiddler?"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[] []" /> \end \define promptText() <$vars newtabTitle={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title}}> <$list filter="[get[text]match]" variable="ignore"> {{$:/aggregation/ErrorText}} \end ! 新建页签 |<$link to=<>>Title |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> <> | |<$link to=<>>Caption |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to=<>>Text |<$edit tiddler=<> tag="textarea" class="tc-edit-texteditor" default=""/> | |>| <> | <> "},"$:/plugins-my-works":{"title":"$:/plugins-my-works","caption":"我的作品","text":"\import $:/plugins-macros <$wikify name="tabsList" text="""<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]] :filter[lookup!match[hide]]" variable="listItem"> <$text text={{{ [format:titlelist[]] }}}/> """> <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList=<> default={{$:/config/plugins-my-works/DefaultTab}} state="$:/state/tab/plugins-my-works" class="" /> "},"$:/plugins-prompt":{"title":"$:/plugins-prompt","text":"
